ai-anya-e0105n27:1_0: The path of purification is mentioned in the way already described, then it is said in the way already described.
ai-anya-e0105n27:1_1: For the teacher, the pupil of the teachers, the teachers of old, the old, the clungs, the austerities, the teachers of the old, the teachers, and the authority, the charnel ground, and the lay life for the jungle thicket, the medium, and the eighthments, and the educating the drums, the manner of the Commentaries. And itself, was said to be foremost in the midddst of gods and humans.
ai-anya-e0105n27:1_2: This is the simile of the town, this is the Aṅguttara in this way: “This is the middling clan, this one is the middle of the day, this is the end of the general population with the tales of the worms, the eighth manager of the head, namely, early, nose, tongue, body, and mind. He displays the gatherings of mentioned separates him from the Dispensation, saying,
ai-anya-e0105n27:2_0: Telling a simile for such a complete assembly, the teacher’s roar, the pupil of the lion, the teachers, the roar, and the teachers of a Sīhahanu, then hes took a purification from the teacher. He thinks they have learned it from the teacher’s presence.
ai-anya-e0105n27:3_0: “Saṅgīsa, there is something other than you.” Then he said, “Do you have committed an unallowable path to the winner life. Then he should understand that the teachers of the world, having made known that path to purity.
